headline: Nvidia CEO Downplays AI Bubble Fears as He Enlists New Partners
summary: The Blackwell processor, Nvidia’s flagship artificial intelligence accelerator, and the newer Rubin model are fueling an unprecedented surge of sales growth through 2026, Huang said Tuesday at a company presentation in Washington.  The event — Nvidia’s first GTC conference held in the nation’s capital — highlighted the partnerships that the company is forging across the industry.

headline: Goldman Sachs Reiterates Buy Rating on Broadcom (AVGO) Stock
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is one of the Most Promising AI Stocks to Buy Right Now. On October 13, analyst James Schneider of Goldman Sachs reiterated a “Buy” rating on the company’s stock, boosting the price objective to $380.00. The analyst’s rating is backed by a combination of factors, mainly revolving around Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO)’s strategic partnership with OpenAI. The […]

headline: Nvidia Inches Higher. What Qualcomm’s AI Chip Entry Means for the Stock.
summary: Nvidia  was edging up early on Tuesday as investors gauged the competitive threat posed by  Qualcomm  artificial-intelligence chips.  Nvidia shares were up 0.7% at $192.86 in premarket trading.  Among other chip makers,  Advanced Micro Devices  was down 0.5% and  Broadcom  was down 0.2% in premarket trading.
